entity_model_features.config.variable_ex: If the entity has a Player Animator animation active
text.autoconfig.mobplayeranimator.title: Mob Player Animator
text.autoconfig.mobplayeranimator.option: Stop Entity Model Features animations from playing when a Player Animator animation is active.
For these entities, blacklist them from having their EMF animations being halted when a Player Animator animation is active
For these Player Animator animations, blacklist them from causing EMF animations to be halted when only they are active.
For these entities, force EMF to use their vanilla model instead of halting their animations when a Player Animator animation is active.
Guess EMF Part Modifier Animation Groups
When an animation group is not specified for an EMF Part Modifier, allow the internal system to guess the group for it.
